DOC.brief_summary: The investigator would like propose prospective longitudinal observational cohort study patient diagnose and/or treat chronic myeloid leukemia Asan Medical Center , Seoul , Korea , use acquire data fundamental retrospective analysis .

Data acquisition medical record include - demographic / disease-associated factor - detail treatment , result - complication treatment - genetic data - survival outcome ( upto 30 year ) 3 . Accumulation data 30 year 4 . Use data retrospective analysis ( include Asan Medical center Cell Banking basic data )
